title: Esi Edugyan on Her Booker-Shortlisted 'Washington Black'
description: Edugyan talks about her new novel, and Lisa Margonelli talks about “Underbug: An Obsessive Tale of Termites and Technology.”
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
